title: Loot and Crafting Error
body: Whenever I try to open my loot and crafting inventory I'll get errors like, "LoLClient.exe has stopped working". I've tried the following solutions: Uninstall/Reinstall, Repairing the Client, checked certain settings. Any help would be nice.

replies.body: We've been looking into this issue where some players are crashing when they open hextech crafting.  We found that in a lot of cases, third party apps that directly itneracted with League were causing these problems.  As a first step, if you have any running like play.tv or overwolf then disable them.  Let me know if that helps!

i don't have either of those and the bug still persists.
when i click the loot button, the client just vanishes.
it is still running but i cant make it visible anymore.
Do you have any other suggestions?
